hero.name: Portfolio
hero.heading: Khamare Clarke
hero.description: I’m a skilled Web and App developer, dedicated to building fast, reliable digital solutions that make an impact. With a focus on SEO, paid ads and smart strategies, I help businesses boost their online presence and attract more customers through targeted traffic and cutting-edge technology.

about.title: EXPERT IN WEB & APP DEVELOPMENT WITH SEO AND PAID ADS SPECIALISATION
about.description: With over 15 years of experience, I specialise in creating high-performance web and app solutions designed to elevate your online presence. From developing robust websites and custom, apps to implementing effective SEO strategies and targeted paid ads, I provide comprehensive digital solutions to help you achieve your business goals and drive measurable results.

details.title: High-Impact E-commerce Site for Startup
details.description: Crafted a sleek, high-performance e-commerce website using HTML, CSS, and React JS. Implemented advanced SEO techniques and integrated Google Ads to drive targeted traffic and boost sales.
details.langages: HTML, CSS, JS, React JS, Node.js

details.title: User-Friendly Mobile App for Fitness
details.description: Designed an intuitive mobile app interface with Bootstrap and React JS. Focused on seamless UX/UI to enhance user engagement and retention.

details.title: Real-Time Dashboard for Analytics
details.description: Developed a dynamic dashboard using React JS and Node.js for real-time data visualization. Optimized with advanced SEO and targeted ads for improved performance and visibility.
details.langages: HTML, CSS, JS, React JS, Node.js

details.title: Website for Integrated Marketing Campaign
details.description: Developed a visually compelling website for a marketing campaign, incorporating SEO best practices and integrating with Google Ads, Meta Ads, TikTok Ads, and Snapchat Ads to maximize reach.
details.langages: HTML, CSS, JS, React JS, Node.js

details.title: Comprehensive CRM Automation System
details.description: Created a robust automation package for small businesses, integrating CRM systems and utilizing Go High Level to streamline operations and enhance productivity.
details.langages: HTML, CSS, JS, React JS, Node.js

details.title: Tailored Web Application for Client Management
details.description: Designed and developed a custom web application to manage client interactions, employing advanced SEO strategies and integrating various ad platforms to enhance visibility and engagement.
details.langages: HTML, CSS, JS, React JS, Node.js

allExperience.companyDescription: WELAB is a cutting-edge digital agency specializing in innovative web and app solutions. Our team focuses on delivering high-quality products and services that empower businesses to thrive in the digital landscape.

allTestimonial.reviewText: Working with [Your Name] transformed our digital presence. Their expertise in web development and SEO helped us reach new heights in visibility and customer engagement. Highly recommended!
I was impressed by the seamless integration of paid ads with our web strategy. [Your Name] not only delivered a stunning website but also increased our ROI significantly.
The automation package [Your Name] developed for us streamlined our operations and saved us countless hours. Their attention to detail and commitment to our success made all the difference.

sectionHeading.title: Let’s Discuss Your Project
